about_the_game:
Luminedge is an intense and deadly combat experience set in a sci-fi feudal universe. Engage in exhilarating duels and epic battles in a brutal dance of steel and energy in a neon-drenched age of lords and lasers. Wield your Luminedge, and prove your mettle in the battle for supremacy.

Key Features

  • Precise-Collision Combat System: Master a versatile combat system where precision and timing are key to overcoming your foes. The weapon collision-based system ensures that every clash of weapons is a calculated maneuver. To parry an attack, you don't just press a button – you physically position your weapon to intercept and block the incoming strike. This realistic approach to combat means every duel is a thrilling encounter, where mastery of your weapon's defense and attack capabilities defines your success.

  • Multiplayer Battles: Challenge friends and foes in various multiplayer modes. Prove your dominance in one-on-one duels or engage in larger, chaotic skirmishes.

  • Conquest Campaign: Conquer the vast lands of Valia, solo or in co-op. Navigate through interconnected nodes to conquer diverse areas, including fiefs, fortresses, and cities. Lead your army, ride powerful steeds, or operate advanced vehicles to dominate the battlefield. Conquer and manage nodes to earn Shards, the essential currency for your campaign. Spend Shards on new units, powerful perks, and upgrades to bolster your forces and gain the upper hand in the war.

  • Customization and Progression: Tailor your warrior’s appearance and abilities. Unlock new weapons, armor, and cosmetics as you progress.

  • A Sci-Fi Feudal Realm: Fight in stages where futuristic landscapes are fused with feudal aesthetics and traditions.

Join the Community

Become part of the Luminedge community and share your experiences, strategies, and feedback. Follow us on social media, join our forums, and participate in our events to stay up-to-date with the latest news and updates.

name: Luminedge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7850 / HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6950X / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Slash your way through intense laser sword combat with up to 4 players! Or lead your army into battle, solo or 2-player co-op, in a node-based conquest campaign.
